name: Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel
description: Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel offers all-suite accommodations in South Lake Tahoe, walking distance to Heavenly Village, beaches, and casinos. Every room is a suite.
shortDescription: All-suite hotel walking distance to Heavenly Village, beaches, and Stateline casinos.

roomTypes.name: Standard Room
roomTypes.description: Spacious room with modern mountain-lodge decor, flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, coffee maker, and WiFi. Many rooms feature balconies.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: One-bedroom suite with separate living area, full kitchen or kitchenette, and upgraded amenities. Ideal for extended stays.

dining.name: Timber Cove Bar & Grill
dining.description: On-site dining featuring American comfort food, craft cocktails, and local brews in a rustic mountain-lodge setting.

faqs.question: Where is Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel located?
faqs.answer: In the heart of South Lake Tahoe's Heavenly Village, steps from shops, restaurants, and the Heavenly Gondola. The lake beaches are a short walk away.

faqs.question: Is Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel the same as Margaritaville?
faqs.answer: No — they are separate properties, though both are located in the South Lake Tahoe area. Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel is an independent hotel in Heavenly Village.

faqs.question: Does the hotel offer ski packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — the hotel offers various seasonal packages. For custom golf packages, contact Golf the High Sierra at 888-584-8232.

meta.title: Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel | All-Suite & Golf Packages
meta.description: All-suite hotel in South Lake Tahoe near Heavenly Village with golf packages.

testimonials.quote: We've stayed at several Lake Tahoe properties for golf trips and Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel is now our go-to. Great amenities, solid dining options, and the rooms are comfortable after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: Tina K.

testimonials.quote: Our conference group of 40 stayed at Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel. Meeting rooms were perfect, the rooms were comfortable, and being in Lake Tahoe meant we could add golf days to the agenda. GTHS made the whole package seamless.
testimonials.author: Jason B.

testimonials.quote: Booked Lake Tahoe Resort Hotel through Golf the High Sierra for our annual buddies trip. The group rate was excellent and having everything on one contract made logistics so simple. The property itself is well-maintained and staff was great.
testimonials.author: Wendy P.
